LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: 「...The rear section is... submerged?」

LABEL: 0x2F6
STRING: Oh no――

LABEL: 0x312
STRING: I ended up speaking without thinking.

LABEL: 0x3EC
STRING: That was thoughtless of me... But it was too late to regret it now.

LABEL: 0x41A
STRING: I didn't need to check, but I was sure they'd all heard my inadvertent muttering.

LABEL: 0x468
STRING: Submerged―that word alone held a lot of meaning.

LABEL: 0x4A0
STRING: There were 50 passengers and crew aboard.

LABEL: 0x4BE
STRING: Of those, there were five here in the front section.

LABEL: 0x4FA
STRING: After all this searching, if there were people we couldn't find here, it would be one or two at most.

LABEL: 0x552
STRING: In any case, most of the others had gathered in the rear section observation deck.

LABEL: 0x5A8
STRING: And it was...

LABEL: 0x5C0
STRING: Submerged.

LABEL: 0x5D4
STRING: All those people.

LABEL: 0x5F4
STRING: I could see the faces of the people I had passed by in my head.

LABEL: 0x618
STRING: Sure, they were strangers to me just a few hours ago, but we were all here together.

LABEL: 0x67E
STRING: Why?

LABEL: 0x696
STRING: Why was this happening?

LABEL: 0x6B8
STRING: It wasn't just regret. It was a question that couldn't be answered.

LABEL: 0x6F8
STRING: This was supposed to be... simply the maiden voyage of this submarine.

LABEL: 0x728
STRING: No one saw it coming.

LABEL: 0x768
STRING: And... what about Touri's sister?

LABEL: 0x86E
STRING: 「My name is Nomura Touri. I'm a second-year high school student.」

LABEL: 0x89E
STRING: 「I boarded the <SHEEP III> with my sister, but I don't know that much about the sea myself.」

LABEL: 0x961
STRING: 「Also, I'm good at PE and modern literature. Pleased to meet you all!」

LABEL: 0xAAE
STRING: 「Hello. Do you happen to know my sister?」

LABEL: 0xAEB
STRING: 「Huh? Your sister?」

LABEL: 0xB86
STRING: 「That's my sister right there.」

LABEL: 0xC43
STRING: Touri said that she was here with her sister.

LABEL: 0xC6F
STRING: Her sister, Hikari.

LABEL: 0xC8B
STRING: She was――

LABEL: 0xD00
STRING: I turned to Touri.

LABEL: 0xD90
STRING: Our eyes met.

LABEL: 0xDA8
STRING: For a moment, time froze.

LABEL: 0xDCA
STRING: Touri's mouth trembled as she lost her spirit.

LABEL: 0xEB8
STRING: 「Calm down!」

LABEL: 0xF93
STRING: His shout was so loud it made her body jump.

LABEL: 0xFBB
STRING: Even though it wasn't directed at me, I also found myself straightening my back.

LABEL: 0xFF1
STRING: It was Hiragino who halted Touri's emotional outburst.

LABEL: 0x1056
STRING: After attracting the attention of the entire wheelhouse, Hiragino continued calmly.

LABEL: 0x110B
STRING: 「We can't be sure yet.」

LABEL: 0x113B
STRING: 「Instead of crying and shouting, let's find out what's going on...

LABEL: 0x11D7
STRING: Momoi!」

LABEL: 0x11F0
STRING: While staring into Touri's eyes, Hiragino called out to Yukari.

LABEL: 0x12A7
STRING: When prompted, Yukari checked the monitor without changing her expression.

LABEL: 0x12FC
STRING: 「...Fortunately, the rear section's condition hasn't changed for some time.」

LABEL: 0x1349
STRING: For some time, huh...?

LABEL: 0x1367
STRING: I didn't know how much meaning a trivial phrase like that contained.

LABEL: 0x13A9
STRING: But the way she said that, as if she had long since realized the state of the rear section...

LABEL: 0x1409
STRING: Yukari read out the information in a plain tone.

LABEL: 0x14AE
STRING: 「...In any case, the current situation is stable.」

LABEL: 0x14FB
STRING: Stable... So no change.

LABEL: 0x152B
STRING: And that lead-in, "In any case."

LABEL: 0x155B
STRING: I couldn't help but let my imagination run in a dark direction.

LABEL: 0x15C4
STRING: So, in the end, the rear section was already...

LABEL: 0x1667
STRING: 「She... She's still in the rear section!」

LABEL: 0x16A4
STRING: Touri shook off Hiragino, who was holding her back, and shouted.

LABEL: 0x16E6
STRING: Her face contorted, and her eyes widened.

LABEL: 0x170A
STRING: She spat out the words like she was choking.

LABEL: 0x1741
STRING: 「I have to hurry... Quickly... I have to go there.」

LABEL: 0x17CB
STRING: Touri stumbled at that moment.

LABEL: 0x17EF
STRING: The weight of Hiragino holding her had staggered her.

LABEL: 0x1819
STRING: Hiragino, who managed to regain his composure, turned her back toward us.

LABEL: 0x1867
STRING: Touri had lost her strength and was now like a life-sized doll.

LABEL: 0x1897
STRING: Hiragino grabbed her shoulders from the front.

LABEL: 0x199D
STRING: 「We'll help you as well, of course.」

LABEL: 0x1A35
STRING: 「But there are things we need to do beforehand.」

LABEL: 0x1A67
STRING: 「First of all, we need to know more about what's happening over there.」

LABEL: 0x1AAD
STRING: 「It'll be worse if we're not prepared and can't do anything when the time comes, so there's no point in panicking.」

LABEL: 0x1B07
STRING: 「Besides――」

LABEL: 0x1B60
STRING: Hiragino tried to say something but stammered.

LABEL: 0x1B90
STRING: After hesitating whether to say it or not, he finally opened his mouth.

LABEL: 0x1CB0
STRING: 「Besides... we have to prepare ourselves for the worst.」

LABEL: 0x1CF4
STRING: 「Do you understand what I'm saying?」

LABEL: 0x1D25
STRING: Her body stiffened in fright.

LABEL: 0x1D69
STRING: The girl's body, covered in a cold sweat, lost its color.

LABEL: 0x1DCC
STRING: Her hand gripping his arm lost its strength.

LABEL: 0x1E48
STRING: 「Touri-san?!」

LABEL: 0x1E6B
STRING: Yukari called out to her in a panic.

LABEL: 0x1E8D
STRING: Touri had fallen to her knees.

LABEL: 0x1EA7
STRING: Once Hiragino confirmed that his words were received, he turned away.

LABEL: 0x1EFE
STRING: 「Are you okay, Touri-san?」

LABEL: 0x1F2D
STRING: I called out from above the crouched girl's head.

LABEL: 0x1F67
STRING: As if in response to my voice, life returned to her body.

LABEL: 0x1FA1
STRING: She might have forced herself to do so, but Touri raised her head, and my eyes met with her pained expression.

LABEL: 0x205D
STRING: 「Touri-san――」

LABEL: 0x208A
STRING: 「I'm fine.」

LABEL: 0x2114
STRING: 「I can't believe I got so upset... Ahaha..」

LABEL: 0x2147
STRING: Touri directed a smile at me.

LABEL: 0x2171
STRING: ...Would the pain I felt in my chest be lessened if she were crying instead?

LABEL: 0x21C1
STRING: When Touri tried to stand up on her own, Yukari and I sat her down on an empty chair.

LABEL: 0x22DA
STRING: 「Don't push yourself.」

LABEL: 0x232E
STRING: Touri nodded silently.

LABEL: 0x234C
STRING: Her breathing was calm, so I didn't think there was anything major to worry about...

LABEL: 0x23C2
STRING: But... Hiragino should have chosen his words a little more carefully.

LABEL: 0x23FE
STRING: Yukari must have thought the same thing seeing that she was glaring at Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x2442
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x245A
STRING: No matter what words he used, what Hiragino said was absolutely correct.

LABEL: 0x249C
STRING: We needed a better look at the rear section before making any assumptions.

LABEL: 0x24F0
STRING: The gauges lined up in front of us only showed the values the ship's sensors detected.

LABEL: 0x254A
STRING: Not all of the sensors were intact, and, of course, the surveillance cameras were not all working, either.

LABEL: 0x25B4
STRING: 「How are we supposed to find out what's happening back there...?」

LABEL: 0x2665
STRING: 「? Why don't we just walk over the bridge?」

LABEL: 0x269E
STRING: Sure, the bridge led into the rear section, as Tokiwa said.

LABEL: 0x26F4
STRING: However... On behalf of everyone present, Yukari shook her head.

LABEL: 0x27A3
STRING: 「They're all sealed by the watertight doors.」

LABEL: 0x27DF
STRING: 「I also confirmed that there's no way to open them from this side.」

LABEL: 0x282C
STRING: The results of the search we couldn't be proud of.

LABEL: 0x28AB
STRING: 「...лл-san.」

LABEL: 0x28C9
STRING: 「...Hey, лл-san!」

LABEL: 0x28F2
STRING: 「Hm? Oh, what is it?」

LABEL: 0x2986
STRING: Touri was sitting on a chair with her back slumped, but she looked up and called out to me.

LABEL: 0x29D2
STRING: My response to her was late since I was absorbed in my thoughts, but I hoped it didn't come off as unnatural.

LABEL: 0x2A28
STRING: 「What's the matter?」

LABEL: 0x2A5B
STRING: 「Can't we use that PC to open the doors?」

LABEL: 0x2AE7
STRING: I didn't answer.

LABEL: 0x2B05
STRING: I couldn't answer.

LABEL: 0x2B21
STRING: The answer to Touri's question was probably "yes."

LABEL: 0x2B5A
STRING: To put it simply, with the exception of a few protected ones, I could do whatever I wanted with this ship's systems.

LABEL: 0x2BCA
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x2BE2
STRING: But even if it was possible, we couldn't, and shouldn't, open the watertight doors.

LABEL: 0x2C40
STRING: I looked around for help.

LABEL: 0x2D30
STRING: Hiragino was crossing his arms in silence.

LABEL: 0x2D5E
STRING: It was Yukari who took over the explanation.

LABEL: 0x2E79
STRING: 「To begin with, the watertight doors are there to prevent further damage if one of the two sections gets flooded.」

LABEL: 0x2EEC
STRING: 「...The conditions in which the doors close in the first place――」

LABEL: 0x2F8A
STRING: 「Is when the sensors on the inside or outside of the doors detect water.」

LABEL: 0x2FE1
STRING: They closed when the sensors detected water.

LABEL: 0x300D
STRING: And once they did, they would not open until the water was gone.

LABEL: 0x304F
STRING: That was how the doors operated under normal conditions.

LABEL: 0x307D
STRING: And right now, the watertight doors were completely closed and couldn't be opened.

LABEL: 0x30D5
STRING: So, if they were functioning correctly...

LABEL: 0x3113
STRING: Then the other side of the doors was already――

LABEL: 0x31B6
STRING: 「That――」

LABEL: 0x31D3
STRING: She tried to say something but froze with her mouth still open.

LABEL: 0x32AF
STRING: Still crossing his arms, Hiragino spoke up.

LABEL: 0x32F2
STRING: 「If that side is submerged...」

LABEL: 0x3328
STRING: 「If those doors are opened, we'll be in big trouble.」

LABEL: 0x3379
STRING: 「Submerged――!」

LABEL: 0x33C5
STRING: Hiragino didn't mince his words.

LABEL: 0x33F9
STRING: Tokiwa reached out to Touri, who had collapsed again, imagining the worst.

LABEL: 0x3439
STRING: She was half-covering Touri with her arms as she sat on the chair.

LABEL: 0x34D4
STRING: It was a heartbreaking scene.

LABEL: 0x34FA
STRING: But I, Hiragino, and Yukari couldn't reach out to them.

LABEL: 0x3534
STRING: I turned away from the two girls while harboring feelings of guilt.

LABEL: 0x356E
STRING: We knew it... Hiragino, Yukari, and I... we all knew it.

LABEL: 0x35A4
STRING: I could guess it back when the watertight doors refused to open.

LABEL: 0x35DE
STRING: But I couldn't tell them.

LABEL: 0x360E
STRING: The situation in the rear section...

LABEL: 0x3623
STRING: was already hopeless.

LABEL: 0x36C4
STRING: I knew that.

LABEL: 0x36E2
STRING: I knew that it would hurt Touri.

LABEL: 0x3714
STRING: Avoiding and putting it off had led to it being revealed to her at the worst possible moment.

LABEL: 0x3778
STRING: ...There was no way to escape my responsibility.

LABEL: 0x37AC
STRING: It was my fault, all of it. How much easier would it be to say that?

LABEL: 0x37F2
STRING: I couldn't say anything and kept my eyes on the monitor in front of me.

LABEL: 0x3834
STRING: What I saw was an accurate 3D map of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x3867
STRING: While rotating clockwise at a fixed speed, it displayed information provided by the sensors in each section.

LABEL: 0x38C1
STRING: The most prominent of them was the signal that indicated flooding.

LABEL: 0x38F9
STRING: A simple map next to it showed the damaged areas in color.

LABEL: 0x3949
STRING: The <SHEEP III> was projected onto a flat surface, and the entire rear section was flashing blue―hmm?

LABEL: 0x399A
STRING: An illusion? No.

LABEL: 0x39BA
STRING: My eyes were drawn to a certain point on the map.

LABEL: 0x3A1E
STRING: 「That's――」

LABEL: 0x3AB5
STRING: 「What's up?」

LABEL: 0x3AD6
STRING: Hiragino approached me, accompanied by the sound of him chewing his xylitol tablet.

LABEL: 0x3B20
STRING: I pointed at the monitor before me, not trusting even my own eyes.

LABEL: 0x3B66
STRING: 「There, on the first floor... The bridge is definitely closed, but...」

LABEL: 0x3BAA
STRING: 「There's no sign of leakage on the first floor of the rear section... It's not actually flooded, is it?」

LABEL: 0x3C81
STRING: 「What did you say?」

LABEL: 0x3CCD
STRING: Hiragino looked up at the screen.

LABEL: 0x3CF7
STRING: Half of the submarine's body was haphazardly painted in blue, like a child's coloring book.

LABEL: 0x3D43
STRING: However, there were certainly no visible signs of flooding on the first floor.

LABEL: 0x3D85
STRING: Hiragino furrowed his brow.

LABEL: 0x3E22
STRING: 「...What's going on here?」

LABEL: 0x3E46
STRING: 「...Couldn't it be just a faulty sensor that's not sending a signal?」

LABEL: 0x3E99
STRING: 「That's not possible.」

LABEL: 0x3EBD
STRING: 「In addition to independent sensors that detect flooding, there are also sensors that determine the situation based on the degree of leakage.」

LABEL: 0x3F27
STRING: 「As long as any of them are still functioning, they'll be able to detect if there's flooding.」

LABEL: 0x3FEA
STRING: 「Hmm... I guess you're right.」

LABEL: 0x4020
STRING: 「But it's hard to believe only the first floor was spared from flooding.」

LABEL: 0x406B
STRING: 「How's that even possible?」

LABEL: 0x409C
STRING: He scratched his head.

LABEL: 0x40B8
STRING: His doubts were probably justified.

LABEL: 0x40E2
STRING: The watertight doors were definitely closed.

LABEL: 0x4110
STRING: If they had closed due to the accident, they should open and close when you pressed the switch, like the one back on the second floor.

LABEL: 0x416C
STRING: However, we had confirmed that they couldn't be opened from this side.

LABEL: 0x4279
STRING: 「Momoi, is it possible that the doors are closed even if the floor itself is not submerged?」

LABEL: 0x42DC
STRING: Hiragino turned around and asked Yukari.

LABEL: 0x4308
STRING: She eventually answered, slowly and cautiously.

LABEL: 0x43C3
STRING: 「...There is one sensor on the inside and outside of the doors to detect possible flooding.」

LABEL: 0x4415
STRING: 「...In addition to those, there are multiple sensors installed near the floor on each level.」

LABEL: 0x4467
STRING: 「If they detect flooding in multiple locations at the same time, the spiral staircase on each floor will be sealed, and the elevators will automatically stop...」

LABEL: 0x44D7
STRING: 「And at the same time, the watertight doors on all floors will be closed...」

LABEL: 0x4511
STRING: 「In other words...」

LABEL: 0x4532
STRING: 「If any floor is flooded, all floors of the section will automatically be locked...?」

LABEL: 0x4590
STRING: Yukari nodded.

LABEL: 0x45DE
STRING: I operated the computer in front of me and pulled up detailed data on the watertight doors.

LABEL: 0x462E
STRING: ...Indeed, as Yukari had said, they were linked to the flooding status of each floor.

LABEL: 0x4678
STRING: In which case... the first floor of the rear section might be safe.

LABEL: 0x46BC
STRING: However, I wasn't feeling optimistic.

LABEL: 0x46E4
STRING: With a difficult look on his face, Hiragino continued.

LABEL: 0x47DF
STRING: 「...So, how do we open a locked door from the outside?」

LABEL: 0x4828
STRING: 「Once locked, watertight doors can only be unlocked by the central control system.」

LABEL: 0x4874
STRING: 「The reason why unlocking is prohibited physically, such as using a switch, is probably because of the contingency plan that Hiragino-sensei mentioned earlier.」

LABEL: 0x48FF
STRING: For safety reasons.

LABEL: 0x4915
STRING: It was not hard to imagine what would happen if we tried to open the watertight doors while the other side was submerged.

LABEL: 0x496F
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x4985
STRING: Now that we knew that the other side wasn't submerged, we should be able to――

LABEL: 0x49C9
STRING: I turned to the control panel.

LABEL: 0x4A27
STRING: 「Let's access the central control system.」

LABEL: 0x4A76
STRING: 「That's impossible.」

LABEL: 0x4AA1
STRING: Her words were filled with conviction.

LABEL: 0x4AC1
STRING: My pride as a system developer was at stake here.

LABEL: 0x4B63
STRING: 「We don't know that until we try, right?」

LABEL: 0x4BB2
STRING: 「We don't have access to the central control system.」

LABEL: 0x4BFB
STRING: Yukari declared calmly.

LABEL: 0x4C1D
STRING: She held out her right hand and raised her index finger.

LABEL: 0x4C6E
STRING: 「Because it's located on the surface.」

LABEL: 0x4CE8
STRING: It was the strongest form of protection.

LABEL: 0x4D26
STRING: So, there was nothing we could do on this isolated submarine.

LABEL: 0x4D5C
STRING: Even in this situation, I couldn't do anything to help.

LABEL: 0x4DA2
STRING: I was like a slow caterpillar.

LABEL: 0x4E41
STRING: 「Then... maybe she's waiting for us on the first floor!」

LABEL: 0x4E8F
STRING: 「Are you saying there's nothing we can do?!」

LABEL: 0x4FC8
STRING: 「...Unfortunately not.」

LABEL: 0x4FED
STRING: A grave expression rose to her face.

LABEL: 0x504B
STRING: The wheelhouse was silent.

LABEL: 0x5069
STRING: Time was passing.

LABEL: 0x509B
STRING: Even at this moment, the other passenger's probability of survival might be decreasing every second.

LABEL: 0x5105
STRING: Think...

LABEL: 0x511D
STRING: Think about it... Calmly...

LABEL: 0x5143
STRING: Yes... It was practically impossible to go through the bridge.

LABEL: 0x517B
STRING: There was no way to open the watertight doors from the outside.

LABEL: 0x51AB
STRING: And since we couldn't contact the surface, we couldn't even control them remotely from here.

LABEL: 0x51F1
STRING: Even if the doors didn't open, at least our voices might reach the other side.

LABEL: 0x522F
STRING: But no matter how much I shouted from inside the bridge earlier, Hiragino on the outside couldn't hear me.

LABEL: 0x528F
STRING: So we couldn't reach out to them by shouting directly.

LABEL: 0x52B3
STRING: I had punched and kicked the door, but it hadn't given in even an inch.

LABEL: 0x52E1
STRING: It was a safety measure, after all... you idiot.

LABEL: 0x5313
STRING: In any case.

LABEL: 0x532B
STRING: If only our voices could reach...

LABEL: 0x534B
STRING: Voice...

LABEL: 0x5370
STRING: 「...What about the ship's broadcast?」

LABEL: 0x5403
STRING: Touri raised her head.

LABEL: 0x54F1
STRING: 「That's right, the ship's broadcast!」

LABEL: 0x551C
STRING: 「If we can't open it from this side, we can give them instructions and make them open it from that side!」

LABEL: 0x557A
STRING: 「Even if they can't open it, they'll all feel safer if they can hear our voices――」

LABEL: 0x55D1
STRING: Touri passionately explained her idea.

LABEL: 0x55FD
STRING: She looked around for agreement.

LABEL: 0x5691
STRING: But... Yukari shook her head quietly.

LABEL: 0x56D0
STRING: 「The impact of the collision must have knocked out the lines.」

LABEL: 0x570E
STRING: 「It's a physical malfunction... and there's nothing we can do to fix it.」

LABEL: 0x57B9
STRING: Touri was speechless at Yukari's report.

LABEL: 0x57E1
STRING: Just as silence was about to fall upon the wheelhouse again, Tokiwa opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0x58BA
STRING: 「In the first place...」

LABEL: 0x58D8
STRING: 「If there are survivors on "that side," and you can open the door from "that side"...」

LABEL: 0x5938
STRING: 「――Why haven't they come over to "this side?"」

LABEL: 0x5978
STRING: 「Are we sure there are any survivors in the first――」

LABEL: 0x59DD
STRING: 「Stop.」

LABEL: 0x59FE
STRING: His voice was quiet.

LABEL: 0x5A9D
STRING: 「Don't say things like that without proof.」

LABEL: 0x5AD4
STRING: Quietly, Hiragino stopped Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x5AFE
STRING: Whether she understood the seriousness of the situation or not, Tokiwa held her mouth with both hands and remained quiet.

LABEL: 0x5B5A
STRING: I wondered if she was this carefree all the time...

LABEL: 0x5B9A
STRING: But maybe it was better to be that way.

LABEL: 0x5BEB
STRING: 「We can't contact the surface or the rear section...」

LABEL: 0x5C27
STRING: 「...Damn it!」

LABEL: 0x5C73
STRING: Hiragino scratched his head.

LABEL: 0x5C95
STRING: He must be conscious of the fact that he was the ship's doctor and the oldest person here.

LABEL: 0x5CD3
STRING: Even Hiragino, who was in charge of the situation, was clearly getting emotional.

LABEL: 0x5D19
STRING: He held his head in his hands and fell silent.

LABEL: 0x5DBD
STRING: I looked over to Yukari, and she nodded silently.

LABEL: 0x5DFE
STRING: 「There's no point in worrying about something we can't control.」

LABEL: 0x5E46
STRING: 「At any rate, let's do whatever we can right now.」

LABEL: 0x5EEA
STRING: 「First of all, which parts of the submarine are damaged...」

LABEL: 0x5F30
STRING: 「Perhaps we can confirm that.」

LABEL: 0x5FCA
STRING: 「лл-san, can I ask you a favor?」

LABEL: 0x6001
STRING: 「...Sure.」

LABEL: 0x604C
STRING: Identifying the damage――

LABEL: 0x6076
STRING: That was easy enough in itself, but...

LABEL: 0x609C
STRING: I glanced sideways at Touri.

LABEL: 0x612E
STRING: If we could find out the extent of the damage, we would surely get some idea about the situation in the rear section.

LABEL: 0x617E
STRING: Would this girl be able to accept the information presented to her?

LABEL: 0x61F9
STRING: But, there was no time to waver.

LABEL: 0x6223
STRING: I followed Yukari's instructions and operated the system.

LABEL: 0x625F
STRING: With monotonous and rhythmic electronic sounds, a series of windows appeared on the screen in front of me.

LABEL: 0x62C3
STRING: Yukari read out the contents of each of them in an indifferent manner.

LABEL: 0x630A
STRING: 「The rear section... The propeller section is damaged, the engine may be damaged, flooding in the pressure shell...」

LABEL: 0x636B
STRING: She laid out everything that was happening to the ship.

LABEL: 0x639D
STRING: Even though I had expected this, seeing the damage report in front of me made me feel unpleasant.

LABEL: 0x63E7
STRING: No sign of leakage or flooding on the first floor of the rear section... That was our only hope left.

LABEL: 0x643B
STRING: Still, if the propellers and engine were damaged, didn't that mean the power unit was almost completely destroyed?

LABEL: 0x64A3
STRING: Even if the passengers and crew were safe, would we be able to return to the surface?

LABEL: 0x656A
STRING: 「It was to be expected, but...」

LABEL: 0x659A
STRING: 「Some of the equipment in the rear section is completely unresponsive.」

LABEL: 0x65EC
STRING: 「Perhaps they were destroyed by the impact earlier.」

LABEL: 0x6632
STRING: 「...If we could get inside the other side's pressure shell, or――」

LABEL: 0x66B5
STRING: 「――All right!」

LABEL: 0x66FE
STRING: Looking up, Hiragino's eyes were filled with dark determination.

LABEL: 0x67B1
STRING: 「This submarine has a diving suit on board――」

LABEL: 0x67F8
STRING: 「No, you can't be serious!」

LABEL: 0x6891
STRING: Without waiting for Hiragino to finish, Yukari stood up immediately.

LABEL: 0x68DE
STRING: 「It's too risky.」

LABEL: 0x68FC
STRING: 「Going out there in this situation is like choosing to die in vain.」

LABEL: 0x69C3
STRING: 「Is that so?」

LABEL: 0x69DF
STRING: 「If there's something else we can do right now, we should do that, but do we have a choice in the first place?」

LABEL: 0x6A37
STRING: 「I don't think it makes any difference whether we go now or after we've thought about it for a while.」

LABEL: 0x6A90
STRING: 「We should avoid losing any personnel or diving suits before trying to increase our chances of success first.」

LABEL: 0x6B6F
STRING: 「So, how do you propose we increase those odds?」

LABEL: 0x6BAD
STRING: 「You've checked all the gauges, right?」

LABEL: 0x6C4D
STRING: 「I'm asking if there's anything else we can do.」

LABEL: 0x6D08
STRING: 「That's――」

LABEL: 0x6D29
STRING: Yukari stammered and cast her eyes down in regret.

LABEL: 0x6D57
STRING: Hiragino, on the other hand, was calmly waiting for a response without any sense of triumph.

LABEL: 0x6D9B
STRING: What he said sounded correct.

LABEL: 0x6DD7
STRING: But in reality, he was brandishing his self-sacrifice to corner Yukari.

LABEL: 0x6E5B
STRING: ――That was just cowardice.

LABEL: 0x6E7F
STRING: Driven into a corner, Yukari grabbed her elbow and struggled to think.

LABEL: 0x6F38
STRING: 「...Audio and video channels... are an unrealistic option...」

LABEL: 0x6FE6
STRING: 「...Ten meters at the longest... Is that not enough? Or...」

LABEL: 0x7028
STRING: She walked around while whispering to herself.

LABEL: 0x705A
STRING: And eventually, she stopped.

LABEL: 0x70BC
STRING: 「...The <SHEEP III> is equipped with a small exploration probe.」

LABEL: 0x70FF
STRING: 「Since this is a cruise vessel, its performance is inferior to the ones in proper research ships.」

LABEL: 0x715F
STRING: 「The cable's length is ten meters, so I think we might just barely be able to see the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x7218
STRING: 「That way, there's no need to go out of our way to put anyone else in danger.」

LABEL: 0x725A
STRING: 「That's fine, right, Hiragino-sensei?」

LABEL: 0x7343
STRING: Hiragino opened his mouth to say something, but Yukari only directed a glance at him before immediately putting her plan in motion.

LABEL: 0x73DF
STRING: She walked with steady footsteps and sat down on a seat some distance away from the control panel where I was.

LABEL: 0x7458
STRING: 「I'll take control of it.」

LABEL: 0x7479
STRING: The monitor before her lit up as she began operating the controls.

LABEL: 0x74C1
STRING: A series of letters were shown that looked to be an abbreviation for something.

LABEL: 0x75C2
STRING: 「Are you sure you can do it?」

LABEL: 0x765B
STRING: 「Are you joking?」

LABEL: 0x7683
STRING: 「My training records are the best since the founding of ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x7700
STRING: As she said that, she held up her keycard to the desk in front of her.

LABEL: 0x7744
STRING: Immediately, a spherical hologram the size of a soccer ball appeared, and she inserted her right hand into it.

LABEL: 0x781D
STRING: 「The authentication will be done soon. Be careful not to get motion sick.」

LABEL: 0x78ED
STRING: As soon as Yukari said that, the probe's viewpoint was connected to the largest monitor in front of us.

LABEL: 0x7953
STRING: Something gradually appeared on the monitor once the control device and probe were linked.

LABEL: 0x799D
STRING: The monitor, which was initially pitch black, was quickly illuminated by the lights of the exploration unit itself.

LABEL: 0x79FB
STRING: ――But.

LABEL: 0x7A6D
STRING: 「...Did it not work...?」

LABEL: 0x7ABB
STRING: The scenery was supposed to be brightly lit.

LABEL: 0x7AE7
STRING: The seabed.

LABEL: 0x7AFB
STRING: Our earlier sonic survey had shown that the <SHEEP III> had already crashed into the sea floor.

LABEL: 0x7B46
STRING: What I had imagined it to be was akin to the ghost ships I'd seen in old 2D movies.

LABEL: 0x7B8C
STRING: A quiet, dark sea.

LABEL: 0x7BA8
STRING: Rugged rock faces and gentle sand mountains.

LABEL: 0x7BD0
STRING: A sunken ship――

LABEL: 0x7BEA
STRING: We had sunk.

LABEL: 0x7BFE
STRING: That fact was hard to believe, but if we saw it with our own eyes, we would have no choice but to.

LABEL: 0x7C4E
STRING: I thought I'd be able to see the ground just below, but...

LABEL: 0x7C98
STRING: In the brightly lit footage, I couldn't see the bottom of the sea at all.

LABEL: 0x7CEE
STRING: Was it a malfunction, a glitch, or a mistake?

LABEL: 0x7D35
STRING: 「No, it's a sand curtain. It's not a malfunction.」

LABEL: 0x7E6E
STRING: A sand curtain?

LABEL: 0x7E8A
STRING: We two men tilted our heads at the sudden unfamiliar words uttered by Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x7EE9
STRING: 「The sand that rose from the impact of the <SHEEP III> sinking has covered the area.」

LABEL: 0x7F3E
STRING: 「Even on land, there would be grains of sand flying up in the air and blocking your view if an impact like that happened.」

LABEL: 0x7F88
STRING: 「On the sea floor, that sand stays around longer because of buoyancy, and we end up with this situation.」

LABEL: 0x7FF9
STRING: I see.

LABEL: 0x8011
STRING: Tokiwa had told us something insightful...

LABEL: 0x8045
STRING: I felt kind of inappropriately impressed.

LABEL: 0x80EE
STRING: After the unfortunate start to our survey, I looked back at Yukari.

LABEL: 0x812F
STRING: 「You're right, Saihouji-san, but...」

LABEL: 0x8163
STRING: 「I expected as much.」

LABEL: 0x818A
STRING: Yukari remarked calmly and sternly, as usual.

LABEL: 0x81DF
STRING: 「Search probe, detaching.」

LABEL: 0x8287
STRING: As Yukari finished entering the code, the image on the screen dropped abruptly.

LABEL: 0x82DF
STRING: However, we could only tell that from the movement of the reflected light.

LABEL: 0x831D
STRING: In a world where nothing was visible, falling meant nothing.

LABEL: 0x8373
STRING: And then――

LABEL: 0x83E8
STRING: Eventually, as the lights illuminated the sea floor's surface, I realized the fall was over.

LABEL: 0x8440
STRING: The cloudy footage stabilized, but the direction of the light was soon blocked, making it impossible to know what was going on even one meter away.

LABEL: 0x84B0
STRING: Visibility was minimal.

LABEL: 0x84D0
STRING: Yukari rotated the probe's camera and slowly projected a full 360-degree view to us.

LABEL: 0x851F
STRING: But no matter which way she looked, all we saw were impurities drifting in the water and the rocky bottom of the seabed in front of us.

LABEL: 0x8577
STRING: If you left the area of the lights even a little bit, you would quickly sink into pitch-black darkness.

LABEL: 0x85C3
STRING: To where nothing existed――

LABEL: 0x85E7
STRING: There was no way to know what was out there――

LABEL: 0x86F4
STRING: 「Hey, what was that just now?」

LABEL: 0x8725
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x8746
STRING: At the sound of Touri's voice, Yukari's hand operating the probe stopped.

LABEL: 0x877C
STRING: A static image.

LABEL: 0x8798
STRING: The dust and sand floated lazily before our eyes, swayed by gentle waves.

LABEL: 0x8853
STRING: I could see something in the narrow field of view illuminated by the searchlight.

LABEL: 0x889C
STRING: 「There!」

LABEL: 0x88B4
STRING: 「What is that thing? A living creature?」

LABEL: 0x88E5
STRING: Before Touri could speak up, everyone had already seen it.

LABEL: 0x892B
STRING: The wheelhouse became tense.

LABEL: 0x8949
STRING: An eerie black object hung over the monitor like a long, thin string.

LABEL: 0x8997
STRING: It then curled up its body like a snake.

LABEL: 0x89D8
STRING: 「Haah...」

LABEL: 0x89F7
STRING: At that moment, Yukari exhaled deeply as if relieved.

LABEL: 0x8A33
STRING: The atmosphere relaxed.

LABEL: 0x8A60
STRING: 「No need to worry.」

LABEL: 0x8A80
STRING: 「That's just the cable that connects the probe to the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x8AC8
STRING: Yukari extended her finger and moved the probe forward as she said that.

LABEL: 0x8B70
STRING: 「Everyone, please keep checking the monitor to see if anything's wrong.」

LABEL: 0x8BBF
STRING: The exploration probe used its searchlight to cut through the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x8BEF
STRING: Even though we couldn't see the dangers in front of us, the probe still smoothly made its way along the wall of the submarine toward the rear section.

LABEL: 0x8D09
STRING: And yet――

LABEL: 0x8D27
STRING: I suddenly had a thought as I watched the probe moving steadily through the poorly visible sea.

LABEL: 0x8DDB
STRING: Even if she was the top trainee, this should be her first time actually operating this probe.

LABEL: 0x8E25
STRING: Yet, she was moving the probe like an expert. I had to recognize her capability once again.

LABEL: 0x8EFE
STRING: I looked at the monitor again.

LABEL: 0x8F2A
STRING: The probe continued steadily onward, but no change occurred in the monitor's image.

LABEL: 0x8F7A
STRING: On the contrary, there was no sign of any living thing in sight.

LABEL: 0x8FB2
STRING: It may have been due to the poor visibility, but in a way, it was disheartening.

LABEL: 0x9002
STRING: I wasn't entirely sure if that was normal or not.

LABEL: 0x9048
STRING: There was a strange silence, like that of a roller coaster winding up.

LABEL: 0x9088
STRING: And then...

LABEL: 0x90AF
STRING: 「Soon, we'll reach the rear section, around the observation deck――」

LABEL: 0x9155
STRING: Yukari's words announcing the current situation stopped there.

LABEL: 0x9191
STRING: They were cut off.

LABEL: 0x91A9
STRING: Her hands were now rigid as she operated the probe.

LABEL: 0x91DF
STRING: Almost like a snake was staring at her.

LABEL: 0x9201
STRING: ――Even so.

LABEL: 0x921B
STRING: Who could blame her?

LABEL: 0x923B
STRING: That wasn't the point.

LABEL: 0x925D
STRING: Everyone was looking at it.

LABEL: 0x927B
STRING: What had happened?

LABEL: 0x929B
STRING: On the monitor in front of us...

LABEL: 0x92B9
STRING: The dust cloud had cleared up suddenly.

LABEL: 0x92DD
STRING: It was as if it had been planned and timed beforehand.

LABEL: 0x931F
STRING: We had an open view of what was in front of us.

LABEL: 0x9396
STRING: We were captivated.

LABEL: 0x93BC
STRING: The observation deck.

LABEL: 0x93D2
STRING: The probe captured a full view of it.

LABEL: 0x93FA
STRING: Of the wide window that had been used as a screen just a few hours ago.

LABEL: 0x9430
STRING: It was a compass for the near future that was both large and sturdy enough to withstand the pressure of the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x9490
STRING: It was simply astounding.

LABEL: 0x94A4
STRING: The fruit of latest technology...

LABEL: 0x94CC
STRING: ...Shattered.

LABEL: 0x94E6
STRING: What we saw before us was a window that had been shattered beyond recognition――

LABEL: 0x9524
STRING: It was now just a big hole that had been forcefully torn open.

LABEL: 0x95E9
STRING: We were speechless.

LABEL: 0x9603
STRING: It was a fleeting moment.

LABEL: 0x962D
STRING: Before we could say anything, the probe's vision was once again obscured by a cloud of sand.

LABEL: 0x9697
STRING: A curtain of sand covered reality.

LABEL: 0x96C3
STRING: It hid that gruesome scene away from us.

LABEL: 0x96E7
STRING: It was too late.

LABEL: 0x9703
STRING: We couldn't run from it now. We'd already seen it.

LABEL: 0x9741
STRING: It was burned into our minds.

LABEL: 0x9763
STRING: We'd never forget it.

LABEL: 0x978D
STRING: For our whole lives.

LABEL: 0x97A1
STRING: I wasn't even sure how much longer that would be.

LABEL: 0x97E9
STRING: There was a tear in the rear section.

LABEL: 0x9807
STRING: A large, gaping hole that seemed to have been torn open by force.

LABEL: 0x983B
STRING: The image that stuck in my mind didn't feel real, though.

LABEL: 0x987B
STRING: There was no reaction.

LABEL: 0x98FE
STRING: Eventually, the probe began to move forward again.

LABEL: 0x9962
STRING: Yukari stayed silent.

LABEL: 0x9982
STRING: But I knew what she was trying to do.

LABEL: 0x99B8
STRING: We needed to find out what the situation was inside the observation deck.

LABEL: 0x99E8
STRING: Nobody stopped her.

LABEL: 0x9A04
STRING: Nobody said anything.

LABEL: 0x9A20
STRING: The big hole had now disappeared.

LABEL: 0x9A42
STRING: With everyone watching, the probe proceeded toward the darkness.

LABEL: 0x9AE5
STRING: But that darkness didn't wait around in silence.

LABEL: 0x9B26
STRING: 「Hey, what's going on?!」

LABEL: 0x9FE2
STRING: The world regained its light.

LABEL: 0xA0BE
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0xA0E5
STRING: 「Seems like something just crossed our path.」

LABEL: 0xA120
STRING: 「Are you sure about that?」

LABEL: 0xA149
STRING: I stared at the monitor.

LABEL: 0xA177
STRING: I narrowed my eyes.

LABEL: 0xA191
STRING: The images being sent to us were rougher and even less clear than before.

LABEL: 0xA1D7
STRING: Was something wrong with the line?

LABEL: 0xA1FB
STRING: But what could be blocking the signal at this depth...?

LABEL: 0xA2B5
STRING: 「Wha――」

LABEL: 0xA2D4
STRING: It slid.

LABEL: 0xA2EA
STRING: Or fell.

LABEL: 0xA308
STRING: The image moved around like never before.

LABEL: 0xA355
STRING: I heard a blow from behind me.

LABEL: 0xA41B
STRING: I turned around and saw Yukari's hand smacking the desk.

LABEL: 0xA4C8
STRING: 「Momoi――?」

LABEL: 0xA4F3
STRING: 「The controls are...」

LABEL: 0xA516
STRING: She tried to operate the control sphere frantically.

LABEL: 0xA54C
STRING: Her calmness from before was nowhere to be seen.

LABEL: 0xA5A9
STRING: Error.

LABEL: 0xA5BF
STRING: A repeating message.

LABEL: 0xA5DB
STRING: She managed to regain some composure on her own.

LABEL: 0xA615
STRING: However, that didn't extend to the exploration probe.

LABEL: 0xA655
STRING: Error.

LABEL: 0xA6E6
STRING: 「Why? Why?!」

LABEL: 0xA715
STRING: Error.

LABEL: 0xA72B
STRING: Error.

LABEL: 0xA741
STRING: The accumulating errors eventually ate away at her spirit.

LABEL: 0xA784
STRING: 「What the hell is going on? How――Why?!」

LABEL: 0xA7DC
STRING: Yukari struck the desk again.

LABEL: 0xA7FA
STRING: Error.

LABEL: 0xA839
STRING: She looked downward.

LABEL: 0xA853
STRING: At the deserted probe.

LABEL: 0xA8E5
STRING: And at the monitor.

LABEL: 0xA8FD
STRING: Even though Yukari wasn't doing anything, the image started to twist and tilt.

LABEL: 0xAA0D
STRING: Continuously.

LABEL: 0xAADF
STRING: Little by little.

LABEL: 0xABB1
STRING: Slowly, the screen

LABEL: 0xAC85
STRING: tilted,

LABEL: 0xAD53
STRING: distorted,

LABEL: 0xAE21
STRING: twisted,

LABEL: 0xAEEF
STRING: and snapped.

LABEL: 0xAF6A
STRING: ...What had happened?

LABEL: 0xAF90
STRING: Silence enveloped the room.

LABEL: 0xAFAA
STRING: There was no answer.

LABEL: 0xAFC4
STRING: The monitor went dark.

LABEL: 0xAFE4
STRING: The image from the probe was cut off.

LABEL: 0xB01A
STRING: We couldn't see anything.

LABEL: 0xB036
STRING: No one said a word.

LABEL: 0xB052
STRING: The probe's search never finished, leaving us in the dark.

LABEL: 0xB0B6
STRING: In the darkness, I was left with a single vivid image.

LABEL: 0xB100
STRING: A crack.

LABEL: 0xB114
STRING: A large hole.

LABEL: 0xB128
STRING: We had all beheld the reality that was the destroyed observation deck.

LABEL: 0xB18A
STRING: If it was simply information the sensors were giving us, we could have refused to believe it.

LABEL: 0xB1D0
STRING: But now we couldn't even question it.

LABEL: 0xB1F2
STRING: We had seen it.

LABEL: 0xB218
STRING: We had gone, seen, and believed――

LABEL: 0xB398
STRING: ――Touri.

LABEL: 0xB3B0
STRING: Her missing sister.

LABEL: 0xB3CC
STRING: Touri had been searching for her, believing that she was alive, and thus had kept her spirit intact until now.

LABEL: 0xB420
STRING: Now, she was like the living dead.

LABEL: 0xB450
STRING: Barely able to stand on her own feet.

LABEL: 0xB47C
STRING: But that was all.

LABEL: 0xB49C
STRING: I couldn't even see any grief on her face now.

LABEL: 0xB4D0
STRING: She had such an intense expression on her face.

LABEL: 0xB508
STRING: Not able to process the reality presented to her, a reality she had to accept―no.

LABEL: 0xB552
STRING: She refused to process, understand or interpret it.

LABEL: 0xB592
STRING: Rejecting the reality of what she had witnessed, she would now withdraw herself from it...

LABEL: 0xB5F6
STRING: ――That was it.

LABEL: 0xB639
STRING: She was just like the old me.

LABEL: 0xB66F
STRING: That was how I knew.

LABEL: 0xB68F
STRING: Pure desperation.

LABEL: 0xB6A9
STRING: That was the only thing dominating her.

LABEL: 0xB6D5
STRING: It held her captive and wouldn't let her go.

LABEL: 0xB756
STRING: It would never let go... Just like I how was still not freed from that summer...

LABEL: 0xB7C4
STRING: ...Just what was I doing?

LABEL: 0xB7F4
STRING: What had I done?

LABEL: 0xB89E
STRING: To her innocent sister,

LABEL: 0xB93A
STRING: to her life――

LABEL: 0xB9A4
STRING: Wasn't this the same thing all over again?

LABEL: 0xB9E4
STRING: Causing the same grief, the same pain...

LABEL: 0xBA1A
STRING: ...The same mistakes. This time I――

LABEL: 0xBA44
STRING: 「What am I supposed to do...?」

LABEL: 0xBA7D
STRING: 「I guess we'll have to use the diving suit after all.」

LABEL: 0xBABC
STRING: Hiragino responded to the whisper I had let out.

LABEL: 0xBBEF
STRING: When I looked up, I saw Yukari standing up from the operator's seat, about to close in on Hiragino.

LABEL: 0xBC4E
STRING: 「That's enough!」

LABEL: 0xBC76
STRING: 「What's the point in going now?!」

LABEL: 0xBCB5
STRING: 「There may be someone in there who needs help.」

LABEL: 0xBCFA
STRING: 「Are you kidding me?!」

LABEL: 0xBD20
STRING: 「You saw it yourself!」

LABEL: 0xBDBE
STRING: 「I don't think there's... any chance of them being alive anymore――」

LABEL: 0xBE0B
STRING: 「We don't know that!」

LABEL: 0xBE3B
STRING: 「Are you going to leave innocent passengers to die?」

LABEL: 0xBE75
STRING: 「Think about what's more important, the lives of the crew or the passengers!」

LABEL: 0xBF1D
STRING: 「You're the chief here!!」

LABEL: 0xBF4A
STRING: Hearing Hiragino's pleas, Yukari turned away and fell silent.

LABEL: 0xBF80
STRING: From this distance, she looked like someone trying to hold back tears after being scolded.

LABEL: 0xC008
STRING: The mood was awkward, but...

LABEL: 0xC02E
STRING: After a moment, Yukari slowly started to speak.

LABEL: 0xC12F
STRING: 「...The limit of use for the diving suits is 500 meters.」

LABEL: 0xC168
STRING: I turned around and looked at the monitors.

LABEL: 0xC18C
STRING: Our current depth was... 700 meters.

LABEL: 0xC1B0
STRING: Simply put, we were 200 meters over the limit.

LABEL: 0xC25D
STRING: 「You understand, don't you?」

LABEL: 0xC281
STRING: 「We can't use the diving suits in the first place.」

LABEL: 0xC2B5
STRING: 「So please... no more pointless arguments.」

LABEL: 0xC32A
STRING: With that, his idea was bluntly rejected.

LABEL: 0xC34E
STRING: The diving suits were unusable.

LABEL: 0xC370
STRING: If they were destroyed by the water pressure as soon as you entered the sea, you'd just be wasting your life for no benefit.

LABEL: 0xC3D4
STRING: ...But if we couldn't search using the diving suits, what else could we do?

LABEL: 0xC434
STRING: Waiting quietly for rescue―that would mean giving up the lives of Touri's sister and the other passengers.

LABEL: 0xC49C
STRING: Standing in a corner of the room, I wondered what Touri was thinking as she listened to this discussion.

LABEL: 0xC4EE
STRING: What kind of thoughts was she harboring?

LABEL: 0xC5CA
STRING: 「――The depth limit of the diving suit is only for safe use, right?」

LABEL: 0xC69F
STRING: 「...What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0xC6D2
STRING: 「That 500 meters is the recommended limit.」

LABEL: 0xC712
STRING: 「But in fact, you can go much deeper with them, can't you?」

LABEL: 0xC7CB
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0xC7EC
STRING: Yukari hesitated.

LABEL: 0xC806
STRING: Was the answer a "yes," then?

LABEL: 0xC859
STRING: In general, all products had lenient limits for safe use.

LABEL: 0xC8B3
STRING: Depending on the real limit, it might be possible for us to use the diving suits and search the rear section.

LABEL: 0xC90B
STRING: 「If the pressure test data is available somewhere, then...」

LABEL: 0xC9CE
STRING: 「If we go to the library, the data should be there.」

LABEL: 0xCA08
STRING: 「What do you plan on doing with it?」

LABEL: 0xCAAC
STRING: 「Are you telling me you know how to calculate the maximum depth from that data?」

LABEL: 0xCAFD
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0xCB19
STRING: I was at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0xCB64
STRING: ...In the end, was there nothing we could do?

LABEL: 0xCB98
STRING: Could we do nothing but wait around?

LABEL: 0xCBD0
STRING: I clenched my fists.

LABEL: 0xCBF8
STRING: What I could do――

LABEL: 0xCC55
STRING: 「I can do the calculations for you.」

LABEL: 0xCC84
STRING: A helping hand arrived from an unexpected source.

LABEL: 0xCD28
STRING: The sudden voice came from Saihouji Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0xCD4E
STRING: In the last few hours, she had quickly established herself as a rather strange girl.

LABEL: 0xCDA0
STRING: I wasn't sure if she even understood the seriousness of the situation, as she kept saying and doing strange things, and was excluded from our discussion as a result, but...

LABEL: 0xCE1E
STRING: Perhaps...

LABEL: 0xCE34
STRING: If she was a renowned genius, as people said, then...

LABEL: 0xCE75
STRING: 「You know how to do the calculations?」

LABEL: 0xCF14
STRING: 「It's all Yo-Yuu Shaka-Shaka Chicken!」

LABEL: 0xCF47
STRING: She made a peace sign while saying that.

LABEL: 0xCF79
STRING: Was this really going to be all right?

LABEL: 0xCFBA
STRING: 「Just give me the blueprint for the diving suit and a calculator, and I'll be good to go.」

LABEL: 0xD00F
STRING: 「A blueprint... That's in the library too, right?」

LABEL: 0xD0D5
STRING: 「Correct. However, as that information is confidential, you'll need my ID to access it.」

LABEL: 0xD1A2
STRING: 「Well, give it here then.」

LABEL: 0xD1CD
STRING: Hiragino reached out his hand toward Yukari.

LABEL: 0xD1F3
STRING: She shook her head, however.

LABEL: 0xD222
STRING: 「...You have no reason to stop us from calculating the pressure resistance.」

LABEL: 0xD26F
STRING: 「I understand that.」

LABEL: 0xD29E
STRING: 「Then why interfere?」

LABEL: 0xD2DB
STRING: 「Because I'm the chief attendant of the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0xD311
STRING: Yukari confronted Hiragino with her usual intense expression.

LABEL: 0xD3C0
STRING: 「And since I'm the chief attendant, I'm responsible for all access to confidential information.」

LABEL: 0xD421
STRING: 「Momoi...」

LABEL: 0xD478
STRING: Tokiwa clapped her hands in front of her chest.

LABEL: 0xD512
STRING: All eyes were on her, and she spun around in place for some reason.

LABEL: 0xD569
STRING: 「Well then, let's head on to the library!」

LABEL: 0xD59F
STRING: 「To be honest, I'm tired of the wheelhouse. It'll be a good change of pace.」
